en_CA: ni li lipu pi jan wen.

en:
welcome, rain.

you have one goal.

reach the top and string the lights.

good luck.
en_CA:
o kama pona, jan wen o.

alasa sina li wan:

o tawa sewi, o pana e linja suno.

o pali pona.
o pana e kili tawa jan [color=#add8ff]{person}[/color]?
o pana e kili {number} tawa jan [color=#add8ff]{person}[/color]?

en: ohoho! oolala! i'm [color=#add8ff]fir[/color] the shopkeeper, and it's the summer sale!
en_CA: o o o! a a a! mi jan esun [color=#add8ff]pe[/color]. tenpo seli, tenpo seli! wile mani li lili!

en: hm? what's you? christmas came around already?
en_CA: a? seme li sina? tenpo pi suno lili li kama?

en: oh well! [color=#add8ff]rain[/color]! ohoho! it's the christmas sale!
en_CA: a, a. jan [color=#add8ff]wen[/color] o! o o o! tenpo lete, tenpo lete! wile mani li lili!
tenpo lete! wile mani li lili!

en: holly berries? for me? uhuhu! you're too kind.
en_CA: kili suwi? tawa mi? a a a! sina pona mute a.

en: here, have a sled. it's nice and slidey. go skedaddle!
en_CA: o jo e supa ni. ona li pona li ken tawa wawa. o tawa musi a!

en: it's the smallest one i can find. you're quite a tiny thing, [color=#add8ff]rain[/color]. ohoho!
en_CA: supa ni li lili mute mute. sina lili, jan [color=#add8ff]wen[/color] o, a a a!

en: ohoho! it's the christmas sale! all items 50% off!
en_CA: o o o! tenpo lete! wile mani li lili mute a!

en: visit me sometime when you're bored, small thing.
en_CA: o lukin e mi lon tenpo sina, lili o.
